full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
Repair of the Cross of Sacrifice Monument

## Reference Number
cb-5208-38558164

## Amendment Number
4

## Solicitation Number
CCBN-23-0198

## Tender Closing Date
Tuesday, May 30, 2023, at 14:00:00 EST

## Expected Contract Start Date
July 17, 2023

## Expected Contract End Date
September 29, 2023

## Tender Status
Expired

## Overview
The National Battlefields Commission (NBC) invites qualified contractors to submit bids for the repair of the Cross of Sacrifice Monument. The work must be completed by September 29, 2023. 

Please note that the contractor must retain the services of the Centre de conservation du Québec (CCQ), whose restorers will act as conservation experts. The tasks and duties to be completed in coordination with the CCQ are described in the plans and specifications.

## Mandatory Requirements
* The contractor must provide an allowance of $17,150 (excludes tax) for the CCQ's services, which includes professional fees and travel and living expenses for the CCQ resources.
* The work shall be paid upon presentation of supporting documents from the CCQ without any mark-up or profit for the contractor.

## Tender Documents
All tender documents can be viewed and downloaded from the canadabuys.canada.ca website. Interested bidders must register on the website to access the documents.

## Method of Tendering
This is a Request-for-Proposal (RFP) tendering process, with a competitive, open-bidding approach.

## Evaluation Criteria
The lowest price will be the selection criterion.

## Attachments
Several documents are provided as attachments to this tender notice, including:
* Instructions to Tenders
* Annexe A - Entente de Subordination
* Constructions et Reparations Conditions Generales
* Conditions de Garantie du Contrat
* Contrat Security Conditions
* Informations tres importantes a tenir a l'esprit

## Contact Information
For any questions related to this tender, please contact:
* Philippe Lafrenière, Contracting Authority
* Email: philippe.lafreniere@ccbn-nbc.gc.ca
* Phone: (418) 948-2260
